divs: Sighting Details On January 14th 2008 my husband and I were out side when we saw a flashing bright obeject in the sky, although it did look like a plane with its lights flashing this object did not cross the sky, it pretty much stayed in one spot.We actually think we saw it this morning also before the sunrise.I have some pictures of the object, although this object was very far away my camera still took some pretty good photos of it.I know that this must be the same object that was seen over texas last night. If you are interested in seeing the photos please e-mail me at trogger@comcast.net.
Summary: bright flashing red, blue and white lights, looked like a plane in the sky that never moved
